item.title: Books read 2023
item.description: In case you need some reading ideas, here is a list of the books I’ve read thus far in 2023. I have highlighted my favorite ones. Leonardo Da Vinci by Walter Isaacson - Currently Reading Bobby Fischer Teaches Chess by Bobby Fischer, Stuart Margulies, Don Mosenfelder - 7/10 1Q84 (All 3 parts) by Haruki Murakami - 7/10 GÃ¶del, Escher, Bach by Douglas R. Hofstadter - 6/10 Steve Jobs by Walter Isaacson - 9/10 The music of the primes by Marcus du Sautoy - 7/10
